📣Attention📣: 

Fluvid basic plan is FREE for eternity and supports watermark-free recording of up to 50 videos of max 1-hour duration (exclusively offered by Fluvid only). The free plan also allows users to crop and trim their videos and add custom title, description and tags. 

Fluvid PRO unlocks unlimited recordings, access to pro features and unlimited cloud storage.

Trusted by 250K+ users from various industries + curious minds globally 🌎 within a span of just 10 months.

📝 Specifications:
▸ Screen recordings are captured as webm/vp8 files with ogg vorbis audio
▸ Recorded videos will be automatically saved to your personal Fluvid cloud
▸ You can export/download your recording anytime in MP4 format.
▸ You can share the link virtually anywhere with anyone at anytime with various advance control options.
▸ Fluvid does not depend on any external software (like Java, Flash or other plugins) so it runs on Chrome OS, Chromebooks, and Chromeboxes
▸ Screen recording is a CPU intensive task. Older or weaker computers may lag if multiple programs and tabs are open at the same time as a screencast
▸ It is recommend (not mandatory) to have a decent internet speed (5 Mbps or more) for a quality video recording.
